definitions.definition: The act of repelling or the condition of being repelled .
An extreme dislike of something, or hostility to something.
The repulsive force acting between bodies of the same electric charge or magnetic polarity .

main_definition: The act of repelling or the condition of being repelled .
secondary_definitions: An extreme dislike of something, or hostility to something.
( physics ) The repulsive force acting between bodies of the same electric charge or magnetic polarity .
